original_solution_mapping.L2: The tilled land will take up half the area, and the trellises and raised beds will be the other half. Each half is 26,400 / 2 = <<26400/2=13200>>13,200 square feet.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The trellises will take up 1/3 of the remaining land, so the raised beds will take 1 - 1/3 = 2/3 of the remaining land.
original_solution_mapping.L4: So the total area of the raised bed area will be 13,200 square feet * (2 / 3) = <<13200*(2/3)=8800>>8,800 square feet.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5796.
    Returns: the size of the raised bed section of the garden.
    """
    # L1
    garden_length = 220 # 220 feet long
    garden_width = 120 # 120 feet wide
    total_garden_area = garden_length * garden_width

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # Half of the garden
    remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds = total_garden_area / half_divisor

    # L3
    trellis_fraction = Fraction(1, 3) # A third of the rest
    whole_fraction = 1 # WK
    raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining = whole_fraction - trellis_fraction

    # L4
    raised_bed_area = remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds * raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining

    # FA
    answer = raised_bed_area
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The tilled land will take up half the area, and the trellises and raised beds will be the other half. Each half is {total_garden_area} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_garden_area}/{half_divisor}={remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds}>>{remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds} square feet.
The trellises will take up {trellis_fraction} of the remaining land, so the raised beds will take {whole_fraction} - {trellis_fraction} = {raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining} of the remaining land.

So the total area of the raised bed area will be {remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds} square feet * ({raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining}) = <<{remaining_area_for_trellises_and_beds}*({raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining})={raised_bed_area}>>{raised_bed_area} square feet.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: The trellises will take up 1/3 of the remaining land, so the raised beds will take 1 - 1/3 = 2/3 of the remaining land.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: So the total area of the raised bed area will be 13200 square feet * (26400) = <<13200*(26400)=348480000>>348480000 square feet.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_garden_area' (value: 26400) was used instead of 'raised_bed_fraction_of_remaining' (value: 2/3).
